title: [CB]怎么在冒险模式放置方块的nbt是什么
author: kosgt
txt_content: 怎么在冒险模式放置方块的nbt是什么

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
只能放在指定方块上的方块：/give @p 物品 数量 数据值
{CanPlaceOn:["minecraft:方块1","minecraft:方块2"…………]}

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
只能放在指定方块上的方块：/give @p minecraft:stone 1 0 
{CanPlaceOn:["minecraft:sandstone","minecraft:stonebrick"]}

replies.author: 一名游客
replies.txt_content:
CanPlaceOn
具体用法：
/give @p minecraft:stone 1 0 {CanPlaceOn:[id:"方块英文名"]}复制代码
放置在多个方块：
/give @p minecraft:stone 1 0 {CanPlaceOn:[id:"方块英文名",id:"方块英文名"]}复制代码
